title: Google\Cloud\ServiceDirectory\V1\ResolveServiceRequest
name: ResolveServiceRequest
description:
The request message for [LookupService.ResolveService][google.cloud.servicedirectory.v1.LookupService.ResolveService].

Looks up a service by its name, returns the service and its endpoints.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.servicedirectory.v1.ResolveServiceRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the service to resolve.

params.name: data.max_endpoints
params.description: Optional. The maximum number of endpoints to return. Defaults to 25. Maximum is 100. If a value less than one is specified, the Default is used. If a value greater than the Maximum is specified, the Maximum is used.

params.name: data.endpoint_filter
params.description: Optional. The filter applied to the endpoints of the resolved service. General filter string syntax: () can be "name" or "metadata." for map field. can be "<, >, <=, >=, !=, =, :". Of which ":" means HAS and is roughly the same as "=". must be the same data type as the field. can be "AND, OR, NOT". Examples of valid filters: "metadata.owner" returns Endpoints that have a label with the key "owner", this is the same as "metadata:owner" "metadata.protocol=gRPC" returns Endpoints that have key/value "protocol=gRPC" * "metadata.owner!=sd AND metadata.foo=bar" returns Endpoints that have "owner" field in metadata with a value that is not "sd" AND have the key/value foo=bar.

methods.description:
Required. The name of the service to resolve.
